content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 1, Barcelona 2.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 1, Barcelona 2.
Attempt missed. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left following a set piece situation.
Penalty saved! Lionel Messi (Barcelona) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  left footed shot saved  in the bottom right corner.
Penalty conceded by Pablo Zabaleta (Manchester City) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Barcelona. Lionel Messi draws a foul in the penalty area.
Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Vincent Kompany (Manchester City).
Offside, Barcelona. Pedro tries a through ball, but Lionel Messi is caught offside.
Fernando (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Fernando (Manchester City).
Luis Suárez (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Adriano (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Adriano (Barcelona).
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Vincent Kompany.
Martín Demichelis (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lionel Messi (Barcelona).
Attempt blocked. Adriano (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Pedro.
Hand ball by Luis Suárez (Barcelona).
Martín Demichelis (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Jordi Alba.
Substitution, Barcelona. Adriano replaces Dani Alves because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Dani Alves (Barcelona) because of an injury.
Second yellow card to Gaël Clichy (Manchester City) for a bad foul.
Foul by Gaël Clichy (Manchester City).

Luis Suárez (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Goal!  Manchester City 1, Barcelona 2. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by David Silva.
Substitution, Manchester City. Wilfried Bony replaces Edin Dzeko.
Attempt missed. Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) with an attempt from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by James Milner with a cross following a corner.
